tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Missed the cut in all nine of his starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica.

2014: Had two top-25s and seven cuts made in 14 starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. His best finish was T14 at the Dominican Republic Open in May.

2013: Made the cut in 7 of 13 starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. His best finish was T41 at the Personal Classic in Deember.

2012: Had three top-25s and five cuts made in 11 starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. His best finish was T21 at the 65th Arturo Calle Colombian Open in September.

2011: Turned pro in March and finished his rookie season as the 43rd-ranked player on the Tour de las Americas' Order of Merit
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Went to Lynn University in Boca Raton, Fla., where he was a third-team All-American during the 2009-10 season. Won Peru's Match Play and Medal Play Amateur Championships in 2009.
tourBios.personal: Brother, Sebastian, is also a member of the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. Sebastian also played college golf at Lynn College.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T14th in 2014 at the Dominican Republic Open.
